Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details: Battle of Cursa and Xanthe III over, Thomas Marik calls a halt to further military operations Three month long battle for [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Cursa],Cursa]] is finally over, with FWLM carrying the day against rebel forces. Despite the victory the bloody fighting has reduced both FWLM and Andurian forces involved. Even more bloody Battle of [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Xanthe],Xanthe III]] ended on 5th of May, in FWLM's favor after the later brought in superior number of forces on the planet. Currently Andurien forces are fighting rearguard actions while evacuating from the system. Another great blow to Duchy of Andurian and indicative of the overall situation for the Duchy, is that [[DM.Factions[faction_Merc11],Tooth of Ymir]] mercenary company in their employ since 3030 and cornerstone of many battles, declined to extend their employment with the Duchy.

Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details:
Captain-General Thomas Marik is calling a halt to all offensive operations for the rest of the year in the war. His stated goal is to give the diplomacy another chance.



This has been the CNB May broadcast.
